articles.author: SAM MEDNICK
articles.title: Niger crisis deepens as France plans evacuation and coup leaders get support from neighboring juntas - The Associated Press
articles.description: France is preparing to evacuate French and other European nationals from Niger, telling them to carry no more than a small bag, after a military coup there won backing from three other West African nations ruled by mutinous soldiers. The French Foreign Minist…
articles.content: NIAMEY, Niger (AP) France prepared to evacuate French and other European nationals from Niger on Tuesday, telling them to carry no more than a small bag, after a military coup there won backing from … [+9379 chars]
